trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SEQ_00<tab>Shale is visibly relieved at your safe return.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SEQ_01<tab>You pause a moment to let Shale savor the recent victory. For her, it represents the culmination of years of rebellion, and marks the end of an era for Oblivion itself. Triumphs aside, Krile wonders if you have seen the last of the troubles arising from the key. The Scion leaves you with that unsettling thought as she heads off to her meeting with G'raha Tia and the city officials. Shale, too, returns to her own waiting tasks, but not before inviting you to rest in the Backroom while you watch over Alexandria's return to normalcy.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SEQ_02<tab>You while away the days in the Backroom, coming and going as you please. In the weeks that pass, Oblivion uncovers several Preservation facilities and makes a comprehensive study of regulator function. This leads to the understanding that memories of the deceased were never truly erased, merely locked away, and that this process can be reversed by sending a signal from the Meso Terminal.
Acting at the government's behest, your party and Sphene escort Gossan to Living Memory, where a much-recovered Wuk Lamat makes a surprise appearance. Together, you reactivate the terminals, and restore the memories of those who consented. The reaction in Alexandria is immediate and bittersweet, with many bursting into tears at the sudden flood of long-lost remembrances.
Gossan is grateful for your actions, and responds to Sphene's request to remain in Alexandria with an unexpected demand of his own: it seems that, inspired by the gentle leadership she displayed when despair held the kingdom in thrall, the people have insisted that she take her rightful place as their monarch. After much flustered deliberation, Sphene accepts the role, declaring peace and prosperity for Alexandria as her foremost purpose. Thus do you stand witness to the rise of a new Queen of Reason.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SEQ_03<tab>A determined Sphene returns to meet her citizens with her chief aide at her side, the Scions joining them to assist with any confusion stemming from memory restoration. Erenville and Wuk Lamat also prepare to depart, the Vow of Resolve urging you to come and visit her at the palace so that she and Koana might thank you properly for your deeds.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SEQ_04<tab>You approach the two Vows outside Vollok Shoonsa only to find Gulool Ja there as well, having come to begin his training under the Landsguard. After showing enthusiastic support for her nephew's ambition to learn swordplay, Wuk Lamat turns her attention to you. She expresses joy at how events unfolded for the queens past and present, and thanks you for helping her fulfill her promise. Erenville, meanwhile, speaks of an impending extended journey, and Koana declares his intent to compile a thorough account of Tuliyollan history even as he attends to his day-to-day administrative duties. With plans shared and assurances to reunite exchanged, they send you on your way back to Sphene and the other Scions.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SEQ_05<tab>Your arrival in Alexandria is met with discussion of the daunting tasks which lie ahead of Sphene, now that her kingdom will engage more openly with the other nations of Etheirys. Her citizens, too, have elected to face their grief with courage─the precious memories they have reclaimed serving to guide and sustain them through the days to come. Whether you are staying to investigate Preservation's mysteries, or departing to seek distant adventures, the soon-to-be-crowned Queen of Reason offers you all, her cherished comrades, the eternal hospitality of the nation you so valiantly saved.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Shale.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat at Vollok Shoonsa.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Sphene at Praxis Park.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_001<tab>Oh, we had the same idea, I see! I thought it might be nice to catch up with our Oblivion friends before we delve into more serious matters with the city officials.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_010<tab>Now that everyone's back, I say we pause a moment to savor what we've accomplished.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_011<tab>We've been through much in these past days, haven't we?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_012<tab>That's an understatement. We've seen the end of a years-long struggle, for Oblivion and for myself.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_013<tab>Cahciua and Geode would be happy for us...

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_014<tab>Oddly enough, fulfilling our purpose has somehow left me with even more work to do. The government has tasked me with conducting a more complete survey of the containment complex.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_015<tab>Ah, the Preservation facility. That lab where they studied the key certainly demands further investigation.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_016<tab>I can understand how those experiments may have led to the discovery of reflections, yet they fail to explain Calyx's knowledge of primal summoning.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_017<tab>I fear that he and his hunger for interdimensional travel were only one facet of a greater puzzle. There is still someone or something out there that may pose a threat to us...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_021<tab>In any case, I think it prudent we secure ourselves a spot in Shale's next expedition to the tenth level.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_022<tab>Right, I have a meeting with city officials to attend. 'Twould be cruel to leave Raha to answer their barrage of questions alone!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_023<tab>I should return to my work as well. My first job will be to analyze the data we pulled from Containment Complex 10-29, and locate other facilities of interest.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_100_023<tab>I can only hope the information we uncover will serve Alexandria and the future we want to build.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_024<tab>Whatever we end up finding, however, it's like to take some weeks to put the city back to rights. All these ambitious plans aside, I think you've earned a rest, don't you?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_025<tab>Our break room is yours to bunk in for as long as you like. Say the word, and I'll help you settle in.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_031<tab>Ready for a cot and a fluffy pillow?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>It will likely be some time before the city returns to normal. You may choose to remain in the Backroom and watch over the proceedings...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>While away the days in the Backroom?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_045<tab>So Sphene is to sit the throne once more... She may have questioned her claim, but Alexandria's citizens have made their feelings known.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_050<tab>A new Alexandrian queen has risen. 'Tis an occasion worthy of grand celebration.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GRAHATIA_000_055<tab>This great nation is set to become an ever greater one. How fortunate we are to be here and witness this turning point in its history.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ERENVILLE_000_060<tab>Gulool Ja was also of the opinion that Sphene should become the Queen of Reason. He will be delighted to hear that she has accepted the role.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GOSSAN_000_065<tab>We shall walk this difficult road together, as Vow Wuk Lamat has assured us.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_070<tab>Thank you for your kind encouragement, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_100_070<tab>Wuk Lamat is right. Ours will not be an easy road.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_110_070<tab>But with your words to lend me strength, I shall take it one step at a time.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_071<tab>And Tuliyollal will be there to support you. Speaking of which, I should be getting back to the palace.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_100_071<tab>I'll make my next visit an official one─no sneaking out under Koana's nose like this time. The Vows of Resolve and Reason will both come, and we can discuss our futures together!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_072<tab>I look forward to it!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_073<tab>Shall we begin the journey home, then? I expect some confusion among the citizens with restored memories, and I would be present to offer them aid!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ERENVILLE_000_078<tab>Well, I believe this marks the end to my role as guide. I was intending to accompany Wuk Lamat back to Tuliyollal...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ERENVILLE_100_078<tab>But what are your plans, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Didn't you have other matters yet to attend to in Alexandria?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_079<tab>No, no, you need to stop by the palace first!

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_100_079<tab>Koana's been wanting to thank you properly, but with everything going on, he hasn't had the chance. Please come back with us, or I'll never hear the end of it!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ERENVILLE_000_080<tab>How long has it been since I last walked these streets...? Maybe I spent too long in Solution Nine, but the city seems livelier than it ever was.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_085<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? No one told me you were coming!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KOANA_000_090<tab>...The memory restoration went well, I am told.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_100<tab>It's good to be home. Thanks for coming along!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_101<tab>I just got here too. The Landsguard said my training would begin right away, so I'll be staying in Tuliyollal a while.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_102<tab>We believe in you, Gulool Ja! And whenever you need advice, your aunt is always happy to give it!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ERENVILLE_000_103<tab>...Oh dear, our Vow of Reason is out of sorts.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KOANA_000_104<tab>Can you blame me? Lamaty'i─you were supposed to be convalescing in bed.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KOANA_000_105<tab>So... You would study the way of the blade, Gulool Ja?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_106<tab>Is...is that not allowed?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KOANA_000_107<tab>I will permit your training on one condition: you only practice swordplay in the presence of a grown-up.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_108<tab>Yes, Koana, I promise!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_109<tab>It won't be long before you're good enough to train without a minder. You take too much after your sire and grandsire for that...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_100_109<tab>Wait─so if you're back here, does that mean everyone already got their memories back?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_110_109<tab>Not everyone...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_110<tab>...So, that was that. My days of meddling in Alexandrian affairs are over.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_112<tab>It all turned out for the best. The former queen really did love her people, and it's wonderful that her love lives on in Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_113<tab>It truly is. With that love as the foundation of her rule, the new queen will be a font of hope for Alexandria.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_114<tab>There's no better way for a life and legacy to forever endure...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_115<tab>You'll be heading back there, won't you? To Alexandria?

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_116<tab>I won't pretend that I fully understand the workings of the key or the reflections. And I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> I couldn't have stopped Calyx without you...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_117<tab>...Nor fulfilled my promise to the Endless Sphene. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, from the bottom of my heart.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_118<tab>Be sure to come and visit us again in Tuliyollal. You'll always be welcome here!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ERENVILLE_000_119<tab>It's time I moved on myself. Once I've made the necessary preparations and arrangements, I will embark on an extended journey.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KOANA_000_120<tab>Well, I expect <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> days will be filled with administrative duties, much as they already are. I am hoping to compile a comprehensive history of Tuliyollal, however.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KOANA_000_121<tab>The tale of our beautiful and resilient nation should be preserved for the future, with each successive generation adding their own chapter to the saga.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_122<tab>I...I think I've learned to be happy with who I am, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_123<tab>Even when I make mistakes and cry and look silly.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_124<tab>And it's all because of the amazing things I've seen with you. They remind me there's always tomorrow!

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_125<tab>Becoming the King of Resolve is not something I need to think about until I'm older, but my father's authority did pass to me. So until that day comes, I'll study and train and do the best I can!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_126<tab>You've really come far, Gulool Ja! And you'll keep on doing us proud, I'm sure of it!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_127<tab>I guess you have to go now, so be safe and enjoy your travels. We'll miss you!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_128<tab>Send our best to Sphene and the others!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_WUKLAMAT_000_129<tab>Whatever burdens I must carry, I will. And I'll become stronger for it, just you watch!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ERENVILLE_000_130<tab>I won't just vanish over the horizon, I promise. I'll let you know before I leave on my journey.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GULOOLJA_000_135<tab>I'll visit Shale and everyone as often as I can! There's still so much I want to learn from them.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KOANA_000_140<tab>I intend to make a formal diplomatic visit to Alexandria in the near future, and express my gratitude to those who have watched over Gulool Ja.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_145<tab>We've observed no complications with the memory restoration thus far. Thank goodness for small mercies...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GRAHATIA_000_150<tab>I hear Gulool Ja has packed his bags and left to train in Tuliyollal. ...Oh, I suppose you would have seen him while you were there?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ALPHINAUD_000_155<tab>I'll need to give a full account of what happened here to Thancred and the others. That said, Estinien may prove difficult to track down...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ALISAIE_000_160<tab>When did Erenville leave Alexandria? Don't tell me he's embarked on some far-flung expedition without saying good-bye.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_YSHTOLA_000_165<tab>You've had a busy time of it, Warrior of Light. Take advantage of this lull while you may.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_170<tab>There are still those who can't decide if they want their memories back.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_171<tab>I said I would restore mine after things calmed down, but the truth is, I'm not sure <var 1A 02 /var>I'm<var 1A 01 /var> even ready. So, we'll make this a gradual process, and give everyone the time they need to prepare. Myself included.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_180<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're here!
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_181<tab>We were just discussing what is to be done after the coronation ceremony. Our heretofore isolated kingdom must join its peers on the world stage.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ALPHINAUD_000_182<tab>The fact that Alexandria is─or was─a nation of the Ninth will be the cause of some consternation... It may smooth introductions were the Scions to provide an explanation for its arrival in the Source.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ALISAIE_000_183<tab>Rest assured, Sphene─Etheirys's leaders are well accustomed to hearing Alphinaud report on fantastical events.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_184<tab>Once again, I am in your debt... I dread to imagine what might have come to pass had you never come to our aid.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_185<tab>Ah, I had other news: those who participated in the memory restoration have expressed the desire to hold a funerary service.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_186<tab>Rather than suppress their grief, they would embrace it, creating in their hearts a place for gentle remembrance.

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_187<tab>We have yet to hammer out the details, but I was thinking we might host this service on the highest level of Everkeep. Ever since my time, we have believed that the departed continue their journey beyond the clouds...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_A2_000_001<tab>That's a lovely idea.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_A2_000_002<tab>Seems very fitting for Alexandria.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_A2_000_003<tab>You'll invite our friends from Tuliyollal, won't you?

TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_189<tab>I'm glad you agree! Some have yet to receive their requested memories, however, so we shall wait until the initial wave of restorations is complete before proceeding.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_190<tab>Yes... I hope that from such a place, our prayers might be heard─a wish for our loved ones to soar forever joyful and free in that heavenly expanse.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_191<tab>Yes, of course... I know of Zoraal Ja only by name, but they will wish to mourn their kin. I shall be sure to ask them.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_GRAHATIA_000_192<tab>After so long distancing themselves from the realities of death, the Alexandrians are to be commended for their courage.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_193<tab>Yes, 'tis a tremendously brave thing they're doing.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_194<tab>Perhaps our hearts can never capture a memory as perfectly as data in a file...
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_195<tab>But what precious recollections we do keep will guide and sustain us as we fulfill the promise of tomorrow.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_SHALE_000_196<tab>You've busy days ahead of you, Your Majesty. Oblivion stands ready to pitch in as needed.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_YSHTOLA_000_197<tab>Oh, and what of my investigations, Shale? I hope you've left some time in your schedule for me.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_198<tab>Do you recall my first tour of the city after I awoke? It was all so strange and frightening, but I've only grown more at home here ever since.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_199<tab>That I now feel a part of this new Alexandria is in large part thanks to your patient guidance.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_200<tab>And so here I will remain. Should you ever have need of my aid with anything at all, pray do not hesitate to ask.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_KRILE_000_201<tab>Some few of us will stay here a while, as it happens. We've made several interesting breakthroughs, and have no shortage of mysteries into which we would delve.
TEXT_KINGMI110_05373_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_202<tab>Then be welcome as honored guests for as long as you like. You are, and always will be, my cherished comrades.
